languages.text: Whenever the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAssassinGlossary}Assassin{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} a target with an attack that has 100 {g|Encyclopedia:Lethality}lethality{/g} or greater for the first time in a round, the Assassin immediately regains the {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} spent for that attack.
languages.original_text: Когда {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAssassinGlossary}ассасин{/g} в первый раз за раунд совершает {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}попадание{/g} атакой, {g|Encyclopedia:Lethality}летальность{/g} которой 100 или выше, он немедленно восстанавливает {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}ОД{/g}, потребовавшиеся для этой атаки.

traits.locale_text: Whenever the Assassin hits a target with an attack whose lethality is 100 or greater for the first time in a round, the Assassin immediately regains the AP spent for that attack.
Whenever the Assassin hits a target with an attack that has 100 lethality or greater for the first time in a round, the Assassin immediately regains the AP spent for that attack.

Whenever the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAssassinGlossary}Assassin{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} a target with an attack that has 100 {g|Encyclopedia:Lethality}lethality{/g} or greater for the first time in a round, the Assassin immediately regains the {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} spent for that attack.

languages.text: Когда {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAssassinGlossary}ассасин{/g} в первый раз за раунд совершает {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}попадание{/g} атакой, {g|Encyclopedia:Lethality}летальность{/g} которой 100 или выше, он немедленно восстанавливает {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}ОД{/g}, потребовавшиеся для этой атаки.
languages.original_text: Whenever the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAssassinGlossary}Assassin{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} a target with an attack that has 100 {g|Encyclopedia:Lethality}lethality{/g} or greater for the first time in a round, the Assassin immediately regains the {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} spent for that attack.

traits.locale_text: Когда ассасин в первый раз за раунд успешно совершает атаку, летальность которой 100 или выше, он немедленно восстанавливает ОД, потребовавшиеся для этой атаки.
Когда ассасин в первый раз за раунд успешно совершает атаку, летальность которой 100 или выше, он немедленно восстанавливает ОД, потребовавшиеся для этой атаки.

languages.text: 在一{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}之内，当{g|Encyclopedia:CareerAssassinGlossary}刺客{/g}首次以至少100点{g|Encyclopedia:Lethality}致命{/g}发起攻击并{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中{/g}敌人时，此次攻击所消耗的{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}行动点数{/g}会立刻恢复。
languages.original_text: Whenever the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAssassinGlossary}Assassin{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} a target with an attack that has 100 {g|Encyclopedia:Lethality}lethality{/g} or greater for the first time in a {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, the Assassin immediately regains the {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} spent for that attack.

traits.locale_text: 在一{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}之内，当刺客首次以至少100点致命发起攻击并{g|Encyclopedia:Hit}命中{/g}敌人时，此次攻击所消耗的{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}行动点数{/g}会立刻恢复。

languages.text: Cada vez que el {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAssassinGlossary}asesino{/g} aseste un {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}impacto{/g} a un objetivo con un ataque que posea una {g|Encyclopedia:Lethality}letalidad{/g} mínima de 100 por primera vez en un {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asalto{/g}, el asesin/go recupera inmediatamente los {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g} invertidos en ese ataque.
languages.original_text: Whenever the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAssassinGlossary}Assassin{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} a target with an attack that has 100 {g|Encyclopedia:Lethality}lethality{/g} or greater for the first time in a {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, the Assassin immediately regains the {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} spent for that attack.

traits.locale_text: Cada vez que el asesino aseste un {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}impacto{/g} a un objetivo con un ataque que posea una letalidad mínima de 100 por primera vez en un {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asalto{/g}, el asesino recupera inmediatamente los {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g} invertidos en ese ataque.

languages.text: Immer wenn der {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAssassinGlossary}Assassine{/g} ein Ziel zum ersten Mal in einer {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runde{/g} mit einem Angriff {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}trifft{/g}, der mindestens 100 {g|Encyclopedia:Lethality}Lethalität{/g} hat, erhält er sofort die {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} zurück, die er für diesen Angriff eingesetzt hat.
languages.original_text: Whenever the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAssassinGlossary}Assassin{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} a target with an attack that has 100 {g|Encyclopedia:Lethality}lethality{/g} or greater for the first time in a {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, the Assassin immediately regains the {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} spent for that attack.

traits.locale_text: Immer wenn der Assassine ein Ziel zum ersten Mal in einer {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runde{/g} mit einem Angriff {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}trifft{/g}, der mindestens 100 Lethalität hat, erhält er sofort die {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} zurück, die er für diesen Angriff eingesetzt hat.

languages.text: Lorsque l'{g|Encyclopedia:CareerAssassinGlossary}Assassin{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}touche{/g} une cible après avoir lancé une attaque d'une {g|Encyclopedia:Lethality}létalité{/g} supérieure ou égale à 100 pour la première fois dans un {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, il regagne immédiatement les {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g} utilisés pour cette attaque.
languages.original_text: Whenever the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAssassinGlossary}Assassin{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} a target with an attack that has 100 {g|Encyclopedia:Lethality}lethality{/g} or greater for the first time in a {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, the Assassin immediately regains the {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} spent for that attack.

traits.locale_text: Lorsque l'Assassin {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}touche{/g} une cible après avoir lancé une attaque d'une létalité supérieure ou égale à 100 pour la première fois dans un {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, il regagne immédiatement les {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g} utilisés pour cette attaque.

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAssassinGlossary}アサシン{/g}がその{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}中に初めて、{g|Encyclopedia:Lethality}致死率{/g}100以上の攻撃をターゲットに{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中{/g}させた時、その攻撃に消費した{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}を即座に回復する。
languages.original_text: Whenever the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAssassinGlossary}Assassin{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} a target with an attack that has 100 {g|Encyclopedia:Lethality}lethality{/g} or greater for the first time in a {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, the Assassin immediately regains the {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} spent for that attack.

traits.locale_text: アサシンがその{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}中に初めて、致死率100以上の攻撃をターゲットに{g|Encyclopedia:Hit}命中{/g}させた時、その攻撃に消費した{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}を即座に回復する。
